name: Road Haulage Association
legal: Trading Association and UK Limited Company
goal: To advance the image and standards of the UK road haulage industry both nationally and internationally.
interests: Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: The Mobility Package and all other initiatives connected with road haulage, road infrastructre and ancillary activities.
